website_summaries.verdict: The Dynamis is a solid and comfortable weighted hula hoop, but the workout accessory’s greatest strength is how quickly anyone can assemble and disassemble it, making this an excellent choice for anyone with limited space.
pros: Weighs in at little more than 3lbs
Features a comfortable foam padded exterior
Quickly disassembles into 6 pieces for easy storage
cons: We hope you like orange, grey, and lime, because there are no alternative color options

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be 60yrs. Old in December never ever get a hold of Hulahoops even when I was a kid ...my video shows how my 2nd day of hulahoop is doing without experienced anyway my Zumba fitness everyday might be a big help for not having a problem of hulahooping ...never too late or old to do hulahoop!!!! Great product fast one day delivery so what’s not to love ❤️ Looking forward for my waistline to slim down few inches !!!👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Susan K

customer_reviews.title: It's not hype
customer_reviews.text: It is not hype, you can lose inches from your waist using it. I walk daily and attend pilates classes 4x week so I'm in good shape. After 6 weeks of hooping 30 minutes every day, I lost 1 1/2" off my waist. Don't be discouraged if you keep dropping the hoop. It took me about a week of practice to keep it continuously moving for more than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: quality seeker

customer_reviews.title: Tough at first, but great workout
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried to use this hoop I felt sore & bruised around my waist. Over several days I rested & used the hoop only briefly. Eventually the tenderness faded away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Athletic female loves this hoop!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hoop! I hate abs exercises and use it every third day or so to break up my strength and cardio training. I honestly didn’t expect it to do much for my non-existant abs, but after two months of use, you can now see the faintest outline of my obliques instead of total fluff/no abs. I bought the warranty after hearing that some people’s broke. However, after two months, my hoop is still intact. There is a small (size of pinhead) chunk of foam missing from a piece- I think one of my cats dug their nails into it. Still- the hole hasn’t gotten any bigger weeks later. Overall, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: soccerstar666

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used a hula hoop in ages. It took a day or so to get the timing right and keep it up. I use it for about 20-30 minutes a day and It feels great after. Yes it hurts, yes it can bruise you, BUT after a few days the pain does go away. It was very easy to put together, took seconds really. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Diazma

customer_reviews.title: I was really looking forward to this product, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this product, but every time I try to use it, it breaks apart. I’m considering trying duct tape around each section so that I can use it. Huge flaw in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Michele

customer_reviews.title: This hula hoop is so much better than the one I already have because it is ...
customer_reviews.text: After using a much larger and lighter hula hoop for years, I knew it was time to change things up. This hula hoop is so much better than the one I already have because it is weighted and smaller too. Now I can do it in the living room while watching tv and not hit any of the furniture or animals once I get going. I can already feel the difference after using this product. This hoop really does get your body moving and using muscles that require keeping the hoop going and not falling down. Great purchase and just wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: mizmo

customer_reviews.title: Not for people who bruise easily
customer_reviews.text: The weighted hula hoop is a nice product but is not for me. They do a reasonable job of padding the hoop, however the inside is very solid and the weight inside still hits you hard. It made my hips sore after the first few rotations, any more and I would’ve finished feeling quite bruised. My husband tried it as well but having had knee surgery 5 months ago it almost knocked him out when the hoop fell down to his legs. If you’re sensitive to bruising or had any recent medical procedures, I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AliKat

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my fitness routine!
customer_reviews.text: This idea is kind of genius. I love to hula hoop - I used to be great at it as a child. I'm also looking to add just 10-15 minutes more exercise into my daily routine. This hula hoop makes that goal easy to reach. I simply make sure I have enough room, and then I use the hoop while I'm watching a show on TV. Ingenious! Very easy to put together and take apart, just in case I wanted to travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Use with Waist Belt
customer_reviews.text: My abs don't feel any different. I get a better burn doing regular ab exercises. Yes, it hurts a bit but just use a waist trainer belt with it. It's a pretty good pre-workout cardio activity. I hula for 10 minutes before I workout. Gets your heart rate up and pumps you up for other exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Blu

customer_reviews.title: Takes up space
customer_reviews.text: Just okay for me, probably great if you can realistically incorporate this into your workout regimen somewhere. Be aware of two things though: 1. You will need a LOT of space for this. Give yourself a ton of room. It is weighted, and can do some damage. 2.) Putting this thing together is super easy, but taking it apart if you ever want to dismantle it to store is really difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is ridiculously large.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty and a nice quality but this thing is HUGE! The weight does make it easier (at least for me) to move in circles with your hips than a cheap plastic hoop, but it also digs into your flesh as it goes around and leaves bruises. It hurts so I can only get a few spins in before I give up. I will not be using this to get in shape after all!
customer_reviews.author: Nobody Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this Hoop!
customer_reviews.text: I don't really have any negative things to say about this product! I use it nightly for exercising and it's pretty fun while giving me a work out. It does hit you pretty good in the sides just due to the weight of it but it's just something you get used to really. You do have to work with it a bit to get it taken back apart but it's not so difficult that I'd say not to buy it for that reason. I leave it assembled most of the time leaned but against my bedroom wall.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: It is a fun way to get exercise and brings back memories of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the weighted Hula hoop by Dynamics to help lose some if my fat and maybe tone up. It is a fun way to get exercise and brings back memories of my childhood when played with hula hoops for fun. At first thought seemed heavy but you get used to it. Good quality. I would recommend for someone that doesn’t like to exercise since it is fun. My grandkids love it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Czarnecki

customer_reviews.title: Just to stick to it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!! I have to learn to hula hoop again 😂 but for the most part, it's a perfect item to loose that belly!
customer_reviews.author: Baby cakes 😍

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely uncomfortable to use but the more you use it the more you get used to it! I found that wearing the Sweet Sweat waist belt and a jacket definitely makes it more comfortable. It feels very durable and isn’t too heavy. My 8 year old thinks it’s fun and is even able to keep it up for a few seconds. I usually sit all day due to work, it motivates me to get away from my desk. Haven’t used it long enough to get results but at least I’m up and moving. Highly recommend if you need that little bit of exercise through out the day!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this hula hoop! I have used it on a daily basis for about 20 minutes each day. I had read reviews about being sore at the beginning so was prepared for that. After about a week the soreness went away. At 71 I was a little concerned about being able to maintain the hula hoop staying in motion but actually found the weight made it much easier to use! I have lost an inch I. The waist and a little over an inch in the obliques. It's so easy to use while watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J.

customer_reviews.title: Portable and painful
customer_reviews.text: Good. I love that you can put this away! Super easy to store. Love the colors, love the padding. It is easier to use than the speed light ones. Bad. It does hurt till you get the hang of it and even then I still wear a heavy shirt. I do wish I could purchase one more link to make it tighter. I went on you tube to get tips on how to hula, that really helped.
customer_reviews.author: Just Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good for exercise.
customer_reviews.text: I saw my neighbor kids doing hula hoops and I got envy. Lol So, I checked amazon and look for better ones and I found this weighted hula hoops. I actually like it. I added this to my everyday exercise and I’m enjoying doing this for 30 mins. It’s fun and even my kids playing it. The weight is ok. Not so heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Mamacita

customer_reviews.title: OMG! FUNNEST WORKOUT EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: This workout is just like being a kid again! I cannot even begin to describe how excited I was to get this in the mail. It is weighted just right and gives me an amazing workout. I have slowly been building up my stamina and now can hula hoop for a few minutes straight. It is quite the workout! You don't even feel like you are working out because you are having so much fun doing it. I love how this one is padded. The ones I had in the past were not very comfortable and bruised my hips. I highly highly suggest this weighted hula hoop.
customer_reviews.author: julie and family

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly after one year
customer_reviews.text: I love this hula hoop which I purchased over a year ago. I took it to my business trip once to get some exercise in the hotel room. I disassembled it and put in my checked in luggage. It survived trans-pacific flights, no problem. I didn't use this in the summer when I was getting plenty of exercise outdoor. Nice way to get the midsection workout while watching tv. The weight feels really good and never feels too heavy. I disassembled it a few times and no issues. Now it's winter again and I'm using this few times a week while binge watching tv shows.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy K

customer_reviews.title: Making a change
customer_reviews.text: Over the past 2 years I have lost 80 pounds and have learned to love working out. I like trying new equipment and this one is fun. It brings me back to my childhood. Works my abs and hips. When I first started I could only do about 2 mins but know I'm up to 15. My only complaint is I had small bruises on my hip bones so now I wear thicker workout pants.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A Leistikow

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the aggravation
customer_reviews.text: I order this item in hopes of adding some variety to my workout. I picked the package up yesterday and needles to so Im very dissapointed in this item. To start the item that I received looked as thought it has been used before. I assembled the item and it would not stay together. Everytime I tried to hula hoop with it the pieces that were supposed to lock together came apart. A piece of it even broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Took me time to adjust to the weight of the hoop
customer_reviews.text: The first few days of using this hula hoop, my back and pelvis really hurt and felt sore all day. I had to hula hoop very slowly and take a break from it for a few days. I initially did not like this hula hoop because it was painful to use and wanted to return it. However, after a week of hula hooping with this hoop again, I didn't experience any pain. I began to enjoy using this hula hoop and would now recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sun

customer_reviews.title: New way to hula hoop
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted to get in shape so we went with this. Wow is this thing heavy. This isnt something we used to play with in the gym when we were kids. You could knock things over with this. It is padded so it wont hurt as much, but my wife has been using this with a waist strap to reduce the pain from the initial use. You can really feel the burn after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pand

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: One of the tubes doesn't fit properly. When I use the hoop it comes apart. VERY FRUSTRATING. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hoop. It comes in pieces and you just snap together, which is nice if say not using for awhile, easier to store away. I did learn... I suck at hula hooping (thought was so easy when I was a kid) .. LOL Practice makes perfect right?? It's weighted, but not so heavy you can't Hula... I would wear shoes, if drops on bare feet may hurt a bit.
customer_reviews.author: CEliason

customer_reviews.title: Strengthen core while having fun
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve bought. I love hooping while watching tv and movies. This will give you bruises the first time but they don’t come back again. I wouldn’t expect to lose weight with this, but it’s been a really easy and fun way to strengthen my core. The weight also makes it easier to keep up and pay attention to other things.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great workout. It is a heavy hoop
customer_reviews.text: Great workout. It is a heavy hoop. I don't know how many times in hit my foot while I was learning. Great exercise. Great quality product. Comes apart fairly easily for travel or storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Was intrigued to purchase a weighted hula hoop to add fun to my workout routine. This doesn't disappoint. I did a little research before buying. Others complained about hoops that are bumpy or leave bruising. No bumps on this hoop,no bruises and easy to put together. It adds some fun to your core workout!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Keyser

customer_reviews.title: Cheap knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Pictures and description shows ridges on the inside of the hoop. The actualy product is flat... dissapointed and feel deceived. Now i have to go through the hastle of printing a label and returning... do yourself a favor, get the real thing. not these cheap knockoffs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fun way to slim your core!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I have always loved hula hoops and come to find out they have weighted ones for adults that can slim your core? It was easy to assemble and is padded with foam and easy to use. You're going to get some bruising at first as your body gets used to the weight, but it gets easier! I do wish it came with a workout video though, so I've had to rely on YouTube for that. But usually I just turn on a movie and hula away and it's been fun and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like riding a bike
customer_reviews.text: So far I am highly satisfied with my weighted hoop. It seems to be great quality, clicked together easily, and I had no problems keeping the hula hoop going. My stomach is a little warm and sore from the weight but its not really painful at all. Can't wait to use it more, will have to wait for my little one to go to bed, hes all up in my business trying to take the hoop away.
customer_reviews.author: DeVault7777

customer_reviews.title: Well made hoop!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hoop! It does make sore ribs for the first few days. A great way to get a lot of physical activity if one must be indoors in very hot or cold weather. I never take it apart for travel as that is too much work. I own two power hoops,since I am now a snow bird. One can really rack up steps on the fit bit while hooping.
customer_reviews.author: Moira Naomi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FUN WORKOUT
customer_reviews.text: ok so you're not getting pix of it put together but i'll get back to that! It was so easy, the pieces just click together in n every other color pattern, it's not to heavy and has impressions ( for lack of a better word) that help keep it on your hips. Makes for an easy fun quick cardio workout in the morning. And who doesn't love to hula hoop!
customer_reviews.author: dayna_r

customer_reviews.title: Already can see a difference
customer_reviews.text: A great ab work out, wow. I forgot how hard it was to hula hoop. But the first few times i used this, it hurt. Its heavy but after the first couple of days my sides are use to it and my abs hurt after working out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hooten

customer_reviews.title: Hula hoop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I need to add something fun into my workout routine. This is a great addition. It does make your middle feel a little sore at first because of the weights but it’s a lot of fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made adult hula hoop but it’s hard playing it
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and good material. Love that you could adjust the hoop size. I would have given it a 5-star rating if I could really play it. It spinned once and fell. I meant t dropped! I have a long way to go to see if it’d spin well when my core gets stronger. But it’s very discouraging and exhausting for me to keep playing it though.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to increase your heart rate!
customer_reviews.text: When reviewers say don't over do it the first day, it is soooooo true! It was just so fun but I did bruise myself and couldn't hula for a few days. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Swimgirl22

customer_reviews.title: Made my waist sore
customer_reviews.text: I've used hula hoops for years to exercise but never used a weighted one. After using it a couple of times my waist was really sore so I waited a couple of days and tried it again and it actually hurt. Very easy to assemble and use but unfortunately I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to hula hoop with traditional hoops, but, I can with this weighted hoop! It's easy to do and a lot of fun. It is too heavy for kids to use, which is a bonus, because I can use it versus it being hogged by my kids. I hope I can gain some good core strength with this. Assembly is simple and storage is compact so I can take it on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: jaide76

customer_reviews.title: Made well, works well!
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered many hula hoops and this is the sturdiest. I get an awesome workout because it's weighted but not to much. I don't use everyday so I just keep it attached leaning against a wall and it hasn't lost it's shape like other hula hoops on the market I've done that to, so I was pleased I didn't have to take it apart everyday other that when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T

customer_reviews.title: Good weight, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleased with my new hula hoop. It was easy to put it together, the weight is perfect, the colors are nice. I like that it can fit in a box in case you’re moving. I haven’t noticed any results yet but I haven’t been using it for long enough so I bet I’ll see it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine ☀️

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun way to work out! I see it leaning on my wall, and it draws me to want to get moving! I feel the burn in my waist, abs, and thighs! I am so excited to get home and use it more!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Super fun makes you giggle
customer_reviews.text: Looooove it.... Hopefully is does something good. Update after a month.... lost an inch and a half on waist... Every few days i would do 100 hulas in both directions... Even have gone more than a week without using it. It also helps you cough up some phlegm... So this is real good for smokers 😄
customer_reviews.author: Paraganda

customer_reviews.title: SO heavy. This think fell and smacked my ankle ...
customer_reviews.text: SO heavy. This think fell and smacked my ankle bone so hard that I have trauma to it and the nerve damage is causing problems with everyday life. Don’t buy this heavy thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aml1618

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading the reviews and I do like it. Didn’t realize how challenging with it being weight and me being older it can be but definitely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: At Last! Fun Exercise!
customer_reviews.text: I received my hoop today and promptly took it to the park! I ended up spending around 2 hours out there just enjoying the beautiful weather and hooping away. I'm very pleased with how zen the experience was. The only thing stopping me from going again right now is that I'm not quite used to the weight and as a result I'm a little tender around the waist. That's to be expected though. The hoop is super easy to put together and doesn't seem like it'll fall apart any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: lady

customer_reviews.title: Lacked Instruction
customer_reviews.text: Disliked that it came in box without any instructions. None whatsoever. None on box or an enclosed sheet. I looked at picture to see the order the pieces were to snap together. Then went on line to see about warm up and any information that would be helpful. So now I have to find a way to print instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I don’t like it. However
customer_reviews.text: So I am not a fan of working out. I do it, but I don’t like it. However, this hula hoop has made working out more enjoyable. It transports me back to my childhood as I work out my waist line. It is just heavy enough to feel it, but not too heavy to make it too difficult or uncomfortable. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Amberitto

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop to for waist training!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy I purchased this item! It was easy to put together (took about 5 minutes) and I immediately used it for a quick 20 minute workout last night and feel the soreness in my midsection. There is a bit of a learning curve for those who have never used a weighted hoola hoop but overall it's super fun and am sure I will be using it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: NYC3225

customer_reviews.title: Easier to hula hoop than a regular hula hoop
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with your core. I cannot hula hoop but can with this. I discovered that the stronger your core, the less it hurts. A few people said it hurt their hips. Did not bother mine. Five minites into it and i have to rest.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Gemar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good, enjoyable workout
customer_reviews.text: Way heavier than we expected. But that made it a) easy to use and b) a real workout. The best thing about this is that it makes working out fun. Also, you can get your exercise in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bob

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Tougher than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this consistently yet, but I do know I have sore stomach muscles after using it. My husband even tried it and was impressed by how much it made him work. My seven-year-old daughter loves it too. I will say I’ve noticed some tears in the foam, but this is most likely due to letting my daughter and her friends use it so I don’t think an adult using it for exercise would have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey J.

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: So i was kind of nervous to order this, I thought it might be too light or made cheaply but it's actually perfect. It's a big hoop which is what I was expecting and it's a little heavy when you're swinging it around your waist but that's the idea lol. I like how you can take it apart and put it back together, makes it super easy to transport AND IT'S FUN. Huge bonus❤️. I'm incredibly happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Got it ! Opened it ! Used it !
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo much FUN ! I am a bigger woman but remembered how much I enjoyed playground games as a child. When I saw this I figured I would try it. It comes unassembled but snaps together easily. The hoop is 36 " and weighted to 3 lbs. I enjoy the weight as I found it easy to control. It is just as much fun as I remembered and will be an easy exercise as I giggle through it :)
customer_reviews.author: Traci Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect weight
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I love to hoop and the added weight definitely make it more of a work out. I can only hoop for a short time because it bruises my sexiest but I know that’s normal and if I keep at it my sides will toughen up.
customer_reviews.author: Gtaylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & Mostly for adult
customer_reviews.text: Ought this for 10years old daughter & wife. Excellent product looking very strong though it is A little heavier to daughter. Use 4 pieces for daughter but all 6pieces for wife.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Father

customer_reviews.title: Fun but ouch!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and good excercise. Will definitely bruise your muffin top! Also it is huge so clear some room! Haven't lost any weight so far...waiting for bruising to subside after one use. ouch! UPDATE: wanted to love this but it hurt too much. Didn’t lose a pound but got a bunch of bruises
customer_reviews.author: Well Hello

customer_reviews.title: Great to add to Exercise Routine
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit of reviewing videos and practice to get use to keeping the weighted hula hoop on my waist and off the floor. Once accomplished, you really feel your core muscles working. Soft cushion material makes it rather comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Larrabee

customer_reviews.title: Fun cardio workout!
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot of fun, a really good workout! I haven't had it long enough to see a weight loss, but I do love it!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Fun and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I read the reviews about bruising, however I did not get any. I was a little sore after the first use, but it was a GOOD sore. This is a fun and easy workout. For me, just 5 minutes a day, I can feel the impact of a tighter core and posture. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kdsays

customer_reviews.title: Bumpy when using, hurts hips.
customer_reviews.text: Not smooth, hurts my hips... feels bumpy when using. Not as fun as I hoped to exercise.
customer_reviews.author: XxOo

customer_reviews.title: pieces twist when using.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't stay in a perfect circle when I worked out with it. The individual pieces kept twisting while in motion. It would have been great if it just stayed in a perfect circle. It threw off my balance when it went crooked. I was really hoping to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Neck and shoulders getting a workout!
customer_reviews.text: I keep these on my bedroom desk and periodically stop and use them for a minute or two while moving my arms in different directions. It's not as easy as you may think. I can really feel the muscles in my neck and shoulders being challenged and hopefully getting stronger!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeAddict

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hoop! I've been using it for 45 minutes a day for the past month and have noticed a HUGE difference in the shape of my waist, and my stomach in general. It's great to be able to take it apart and bring it places if I want to, and the weight of it feels great when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Casey

customer_reviews.title: Good hoop
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a hula hoop before, so when first using it, I was a little sore around the midsection, but after the first day and a couple days of rest in between, I can hoop as long as I want and not become sore. It also snaps together well. I am very happy with this hula hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Fun Workout!
customer_reviews.text: This hoop is great! Yes, it will hurt the first few times your hurlnit around your waist but once you get comfortable and a little stronger it’s a fun workout. The only reason I’m not giving it 5 stars is because I hit the hoop on my dresser and the foam ripped but the hoop is still functional. This is the most fun way to work out - put on some music you enjoy and the time passes quickly and your heart rate spikes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Childhood Fun = Adult Exercise
customer_reviews.text: I'm having a great time with my hula hoop. It snapped together easily and hasn't come apart since. I've been revisiting my childhood as I learn to hula hoop again. I'm not very good at it yet but I can keep it up a bit longer each day.
customer_reviews.author: Denice

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've recently taken up hula hooping and was really excited about this new one. It's easy to assemble (and take apart, too), great/durable materials and is overall a high quality purchase! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elise MacBello

customer_reviews.title: Good quality use everyday
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and I use it everyday. Note it’s a bit heavy and might run big for a 5’4’’ lady. It might hurt in the beginning but feels good once you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for hooping workout!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hula hoop! You can get a good workout in 15 minutes. The hoop works the entire core area. It was easy to assemble. Three pounds. Edited 2/4/18. Someone wanted to know the size. It is 42 inches. I am short, and worried it might be too big, but it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Moni B

customer_reviews.title: Wear a waist trainer to protect hips
customer_reviews.text: I love it! But it does bruise you. I am waiting for the bruises to go away. So I can use it again. Wear a waist trimmer!!! If not 2 to protect your hips. Maybe I should have started off lighter weight as it's 3ibs
customer_reviews.author: M. Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Foam started chipping off before 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: Used it once for about 10 mins, Couple days later went to use it again and noticed big cracks in the foam. Very disappointed. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Shake it!
customer_reviews.text: Great workout product! I love that you can take it apart for easy storage. It's also great that it's weighted because it makes for a hard workout. Once you get it together it's a little bit of a pain to separate it, but that keeps it coming apart mid workout.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Weighted hula hoop
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice weighted hula hoop. It was easy to put together and easy to take apart if you don't have room to store it in one piece. This is not easy to use, but keep trying, it does get easier with practice. Good exercise to trim your waistline!
customer_reviews.author: Donna W.

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight and thickness of this hoop. Great girth. I had to work up to it...finally adding the last bit of length just yesterday. It’s easy to assemble but harder to disassemble. I generally just leave it together. I hoop with the dog every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Hali

customer_reviews.title: Abdominal Bruising
customer_reviews.text: This caused bruises all over my abdominal area. I had to return it, and the downside to that is that I had to pay for the return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time (don’t buy)
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and it doesn’t move smoothly. It just falls to the ground as soon as you start. Not really an effective product , waste of money 👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and effective fitness equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great fitness tool. Easy to assemble and use. I had a dime sized bruise on my ab and was a tiny bit sore for a day or two. That passed and I hula hoop several times a day and can see results... firmer abs and 2lb. weight loss in 1week. I highly recommend this hoop to liven up your fitness routine. The hoop stays together well and the connector bumps are not noticeable to me.
customer_reviews.author: dtherese

customer_reviews.title: Great Ab workout.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. It is weighted just enough for a good workout. Even my daughters love it. It took time to relearn how to hula hoop but now I can't stop. It is easy to put together. I would recommend this product for a great ab workout.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and stays together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and stays together. Also simple to take a part with a push button and pull. I like the weight of this and the size. i was worried it would be to small but it isnt at all. I also like the soft padding on the outside of the product. Very happy with this purchase and product.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMOM

customer_reviews.title: Fun little workout!
customer_reviews.text: Assembled it in seconds! My hip was a little sore or bruised but I was expecting that. It feels good doing it also is easy. It doesn’t feel like a workout. I’d also recommend watching hula hoop work out videos! They’re fun!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Why did I not buy this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the circumference is too big. I even tried to take 1 piece out. No, it doesn't work without all the pieces together. The weight is just right. Really good for warming up your core.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fun workout
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It does hurt a little the first week you use it. I recommend only doing 30 seconds a few times a day to get your body used to it. It an easy and fun way to work out. I’ve been telling all my coworkers about it!
customer_reviews.author: LisaK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Weighted Hula Hoop!
customer_reviews.text: ... I bought it for my girlfriend and it exceeded expectations. She really wanted this badly for a long time and began using it immediately. It took a few days (and numerous bruises) to figure out, but she got the hang of it quickly and uses it every day now. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rob W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a core workout
customer_reviews.text: Great for a core workout. I'm definitely not the best when it comes to hula hooping lol but the weight in the hoop helps. My kids and i have contests now that I almost never win but it's a great workout to try!
customer_reviews.author: Mcgomery

customer_reviews.title: Great for weight loss
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it's weighted. Of course its not like the one I had as a teenager....that had beads inside you could hear as it swished around your waist. Too bad there were no beads inside of the Hoola Hoop. Other than that...the product is put together well, I like it and it serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Archie

customer_reviews.title: Really neat product and good quality
customer_reviews.text: My kids really like this and it does give a pretty good burn. Customer service was great when I had questions about how to register for the lifetime warrant
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Gosnell

customer_reviews.title: Best Workout ever!
customer_reviews.text: This hoola hoop was very easy to put together and very sturdy! Hoola hooping is on par with swimming. Great for cardio, back, quads, hams, butt, balance, etc. I love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Francine A. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Easy to assembly and disassemble. Sturdy; seems like it will be long lasting even with a good deal of use. Nice weight for easy use. Very pleased. The sales box can be used for storage and transport, but I’ll probably need to find another container soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good workout!
customer_reviews.text: At first when I put it together, I didn’t have them all “clicked” in properly. So when I used it, it fell apart. Then I did it properly! Very sturdy, a great workout! I’m very happy with this weighted hula hoop!
customer_reviews.author: Kari S.

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise tool!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for additional exercise and toning. This hoop is easy to put together, each piece clips into the next and is also easy to dissemble. It takes a bit of practice to get used to the weight but once you get it you end up with a good workout. Hoping to see some results soon!
customer_reviews.author: JHabs

customer_reviews.title: Nice to use, tear in foam after use
customer_reviews.text: It can't be from overuse, abuse, or anything else. Just a small lady trying to work on some muscles. It was great until I noticed a tear in the foam after using it once.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: It is fun.
customer_reviews.text: Came with no instructions. Just in the box. I put it together by looking at online pictures. I Wwill buy two more.
customer_reviews.author: UserName_PenName

customer_reviews.title: Fun for whole family to lose weight
customer_reviews.text: Very fun way to work out and lose weight. You can make this as large or small as you want. Pieces fit together for easy storage. A little hard to undo once you put together is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Schlutter

customer_reviews.title: Foam rips after first use. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a decent warm up. Would not purchase again. Received today, used twice, foam has already ripped in 2 places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun but challenging workout
customer_reviews.text: I love this hula hoop. It is great for working out. It is big, but it easily comes apart for storage. I love that it comes in detachable portions. It weighs a little over 3 pounds. It is a very fun, but it is definitely a workout.
customer_reviews.author: MWHALL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight
customer_reviews.text: My wife liked it. Her fitness trainer asked to get one and I found this one and the weight is perfect, not too heavy or not too light. It’s been more than a month since she started using it and still sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for working out.
customer_reviews.text: This is fun! I just had twins and I’m hoping it will help me work off my baby weight. It arrives in parts, but it was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: april

product_meta.title: Dynamis Fat Burning Weighted Hoola Hoop
feature_bullets: Are you tired of the same old boring workout routine? Do you wish there was a fun way to lose weight and get the body you have dreamed of? Our Weighted Hoola Hoop is the right choice then. It's weighted for maximum exercise, calorie burn and getting you in shape. Hoola hoop exercise is the wave of the future, don't miss out.

Our adult weighted hoola hoop is made of a comfortable foam padded exterior and a high quality durable plastic core. With 6 detachable sections and weighing in at just over 3 pounds, you can easily take your weighted hoola hoop with you, whether traveling across country or across town. We made the hoola hoop easy to assemble and retain perfect balance when used.
Hoola hoops for adults is the hottest craze being used by many. Hoola hoop provides an enjoyable exercise and can help you get in shape while having fun.
Works great and easy to use. Our hoop is just over 3 pounds and provides a good and effective workout.
